actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Concurrent resolution concerning removal of automotive emission control devices by individuals or independent automotive service stations which are neither manufacturers or dealers.

summary.text: States that removal of automotive emission control devices by individuals or independent automotive service stations which are neither manufacturers nor dealers is not regulated by provisions of the Clean Air Act which prohibit such removal by manufacturers or dealers.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution concerning removal of automotive emission control devices by individuals or independent automotive service stations which are neither manufacturers or dealers.
